name: Crack The Citadel
description: Dandy, a young sprout, awakens to find himself alone, in a dark prison that seems to expand forever. Other creatures, locked under the dirt and soil, whose minds have decayed into nothing. Keep your fragile body moving, by eating any gelatin or small enough creatures you find, to restore and regulate your strength. Defeat the prison guards, and the beasts that have already satisfied their hungers, and break free!
